item.title: LEGO Pokémon Range Revealed: Pikachu, Eevee, And A 6,800-Piece Beast
item.description: LEGO and The Pokémon Company International have finally announced the first three sets of their all-new collaboration, and they look fantastic.

item.title: Apple’s Surprise iPhone Software Upgrade Here Any Minute Now, Report Claims

item.title: Amazon On The Future For $50 AI Wearable That Listens To Conversations
item.description: You won't find it on Amazon's store just yet, but it sounds like the tech giant has big plans for subsidiary Bee's $50 listening AI band.

item.title: 2026 Mixture Of Experts (MoE) Models And The Consell De Cent
item.description: Consell de Cent analogy frames MoE: many experts, one router per token, boosting scale efficiently.

item.title: Apple’s Exclusive Google Deal Is Bad News For Samsung
item.description: Apple's AI deal with Google brings Gemini to iPhone — and gives Samsung a serious problem.
